block.modelFields: [collapsible, feature-list_link, feature-list_linkText, feature-list_linkType, feature-list_secondlink, feature-list_secondlinkText, feature-list_secondlinkType, footnote]
block.name: Feature List

item_0.name: List Item
item_0.listItem_description:
• Your One-Stop Shop
    See invoice due dates and past-due bills, administrative tasks, and relevant alerts on one dashboard.

item_1.name: List Item
item_1.listItem_description:
• Payments are a Snap
    Pay an invoice without even logging in. Set up an automatic payment schedule, and add or remove payment types from your Billing Centre wallet.

item_2.name: List Item
item_2.listItem_description:
• Your Invoices, Your Way
    A searchable, sortable table view of all your bills lets you find exactly what you're looking for.
